problem.markdown:
>>Caterpillars are hatching two weeks earlier on average because of an increase in: << () daylight () rainfall (x) temperature () windstorms () sea level
[explanation] The hatching of caterpillars is cued by temperature. The flycatcher hatching is not cued by temperature and thus have become out of sync with caterpillar hatching. [explanation]
problem.p: Caterpillars are hatching two weeks earlier on average because of an increase in:

choicegroup.label: Caterpillars are hatching two weeks earlier on average because of an increase in:

div.p: The hatching of caterpillars is cued by temperature. The flycatcher hatching is not cued by temperature and thus have become out of sync with caterpillar hatching.
